name: Pride Collection
description: (Sapphic is not a Limited Edition scent and is available all year but is included here in this listing for ease because it is a Pride scent!)
openNotes: ["59pm est or while supplies last. originally all scents were part of the general collection", "they are now only available during june for pride."]

name: Radiant Kitten
description: Radiant Kitten is the youngest of the female Kittens and the second youngest overall. Closest to Nimble Kitten, she is an avid dancer, volley ball player, and overall sunshine child. Almost always smiling, she is very boisterous and not afraid to break a sweat.
openNotes: ["heaps of mandarin oranges", "orange blossoms", "tangerine", "neroli", "vanilla", "a sip of cognac", "dried corn husks."]

name: Fairy Dust
description: If you happened upon a Fairy's stash of their magical dust, surely it would smell as sugary sweet as this.
openNotes: ["sugary strawberry", "vanilla", "sweet cotton candy."]

name: Lamb Melody
description: Defualt Colour: Pink
openNotes: ["earl grey tea", "turkish rose petals", "condensed milk", "a squeeze of honey."]

name: Moon Milk
description: Moon Milk is a rich and creamy vanilla scent with warm, crisp waffle cone notes that will leave you and everyone else craving a sweet treat.
openNotes: ["creamy vanilla cake", "ice cream with a crispy cinnamon waffle cone."]

name: Magical Girl
description: Whether after a long night of fighting evil or a long day of winning love, every Magical Girl deserves to take a relaxing and simply sweet bath--and what Magical Girl doesn't dream of a bath in marshmallows? Don't worry about your secret identities being compromised, though, my lips are sealed.
openNotes: ["sweet", "toasted marshmallow."]

name: Festival Days
description: *Milky's Note: Festival Days is a fun, fizzy scent. This one is extremely sweet and sugary and shouldn't be passed up for its uniqueness. On me this is very effervescent, with hints of lemon-lime and an abundance of sweet powdery sugar. The strawberry is very faint but adds a 'berry'ness to the overall scent.
openNotes: ["ramune", "strawberry pocky", "konbini dessert cakes", "rock candy."]

name: Festival Nights
description: This scent was created for Beast as a pair to Festival Days. The two are meant to evoke both the days and nights of the warm summer time where festivals are common in Japan.
openNotes: ["melon kakigori", "dango drizzled with mizuame", "wataame", "fireworks in the distance."]

name: Angel Blood
description: When angel's bleed their golden ichor surely it must have scent... perhaps to some the scent may be a profound and unknowable scent but at least here, this angel's blood smells like bananas.
openNotes: ["mashed bananas", "fluffy vanilla cake", "a drizzle of caramel", "condensed milk", "the softest hints of peach", "pineapple."]

name: Bubble Tea Sprites
description: This scent was originally exclusive to a Poesie Perfume limited edition Box based on Studio Ghibli works.
openNotes: ["honeydew", "strawberry", "white rabbit taffies with taro bubble tea."]

name: Doll Parts
description: This doll made up of various parts is a lover of rainy days, crossword puzzles, and the escape of fantasy worlds inside of books. If you're ever unsure where to find this doll, the best bet is to check a cozy little nook where one could easily get lost in their own mind. Don't worry, this doll and all their parts isn't haunted.
openNotes: ["rich madagascar\u00a0vanilla bean", "creamy french vanilla", "hazelnuts", "spoonfuls of brown sugar", "delicately sugared orchid petals."]

name: Dream Eater
description: What would dreams taste like if you could eat them? Hopefully just like this.
openNotes: ["freshly baked bread with a warm vanilla drizzle", "fat sugar crystals sprinkled on top", "hints of creamy coconut", "faint whiffs of cedar", "moss."]

name: Kneady Kitten
description: (black baths sometimes appear more green but will turn your water a dark colour!)
openNotes: ["warm sweet bread", "melting butter", "a base of rich vanilla."]

name: Rabbit Cafe
description: If you're a fan of doughnuts you'll have to stop in at the Rabbit Cafe. Where cute lapines will fry up the sugary sweet treat and slather it with fresh fruity jam. You can't go wrong with this sweet treat of a bath!​
openNotes: ["sugary fried dough", "strawberry jam", "a hint of florals such as gardenia", "jasmine meet vanilla", "coconut musk", "white amber."]

name: Enchanting Blood
description: What is that intoxicating scent? Is it creating illusions or simply driving you into a desperate, frenzied madness. Some may call it Marechi, some may consider it a Blood Demon Art… but there’s no doubt about it that it’s unlike anything else you’ve ever encountered.
openNotes: ["refreshing lime", "lemongrass", "grated ginger", "green tea."]

name: Moon Dust
description: This scent was originally exclusive to a Poesie Perfume limited edition Box.
openNotes: ["peach nectar", "tart raspberries", "buttercream frosting", "magnolia blooms", "sponge cake", "whispers of honeysuckle", "jasmine."]

name: Pouty Kitten
description: Pouty Kitten is the eldest male sibling of all the Kittens but is still third in line. A boy who is prone to, well, pouting in order to get what he wants, his older sister Silky Kitten often falls for his pouts the most. His best friend is 'Festival Days'.
openNotes: ["old fashioned cream soda", "piles of sugared strawberries", "a bowl of whipped cream", "freshly cut grass on a warm summer day."]

name: Clowning Around
description: It's time to honk your big red nose, do some fun little tricks and flips, and put a smile on everyone's face--let's get Clowning Around! Immerse yourself in the lovely summertime scents of a circus or faire.
openNotes: ["fresh", "buttered", "caramel popcorn", "salty peanuts", "tufts of blue cotton candy", "taffy apples."]

name: Gourmandy Peach
description: If Milky were a magical girl, their name would certainly be Gourmandy Peach and this is exactly what they'd smell like!
openNotes: ["peach: delicious", "ripe peaches covered in melted marshmallow", "soaked in condensed milk."]

name: Sapphic
description: Sapphic
openNotes: ["juicy ripe peach", "sugar drenched strawberries."]

name: Himbo Hugs
description: What could be sweeter than being wrapped up in a hug from the strong arms of a himbo? Well, obviously it would be those same hugs smelling like sweet and chewy gummy bears. Your local himbo's favourite snack. This scent has been a long time in the making, a personal request from Beast himself.
openNotes: ["a freshly opened bag of assorted fruity gummy bears."]

name: Silky Kitten
description: All Kittens like baths, it's just a fact--even if little known. This Kitten in particular really loves them when they're scented in some of their favourite sweet treats. Cotton candy, bubble gum, a plate of shortbread cookies balanced with sweet lemonade and tart pink grapefruit. What's not to like? Embrace your inner Kitten and try this scent today!
openNotes: ["cotton candy", "bubble gum", "pink grapefruit slices", "a glass of lemonade", "endless stacks of shortbread."]

name: Mermaid Tears
description: If Mermaids cried what would it smell like? Probably this amazing citrus, sea-side scent. Bathe in a Mermaid's Tears so you can smell like you just stepped out of the sea... no one has to know you stepped out of a Mermaid's tears!
openNotes: ["soft citrus", "sea water", "fresh air", "beach wood."]
